last_episode_to_air.name: He Gave Her the Tip
last_episode_to_air.overview: Marks’s choices impact Timber Creek Lodge and bring him deep regret.  Joey calls an end of the season meeting with the team, causing worry from several of the staff. Cynthia receives a heartbreaking text and does something completely out of character, which surprises Louise.  Jenna settles the score with Mark.

name: Timber Creek Lodge
overview: Viewers go behind the cabin doors of a five-star mountain retreat to see the on-and-off duty shenanigans of the staff working around the clock to provide the ultimate winter vacation experience to the privileged class.

episodes.name: A Hint of Nuts
episodes.overview: Timber Creek Lodge opens for business as the staff tries to find the balance between five-star service and entertaining their first guests – U.S. Military alpha men celebrating a bachelor party. Assistant Lodge Manager Jamie attempts to navigate through Lodge Manager Katy’s hands-off leadership style. Mark and Jenna spark up a not-so-secret romance. The VIP Mountain Hosts show the guests the time of their lives heli-skiing, slip n’ sliding and partying, but their obsession with keeping the guests happy obstructs the “landscape” of their professionalism and puts the future of the lodge in jeopardy.

episodes.name: The One Night Stand That Won't Go Away
episodes.overview: The staff has found their groove and everything is going well until Katy gets bad news from home, forcing her to make a tough decision. With the Bachelors gone, everyone takes advantage of their first night off and secrets are revealed over sushi and sake. Much to Mark’s surprise, Jenna decides to move out of their room and in with Mark’s ex-girlfriend, Nikita. The next group of guests will put the staff to the test as award-winning private caterer, Andrea and her family from New York give Nikita a run for her money, while everyone else is adjusting to the new dynamics of the house.

episodes.name: Don't Poke The Bear
episodes.overview: After the guests are unimpressed with lunch, the pressure is on for Nikita to make a flawless family-style Italian feast for award-winning caterer, Andrea, and her family. Trying to prove himself in a leadership role, Jamie struggles to keep the standards of the lodge up to par as the staff disrespects his authority.  Butting heads with Mark and Nikita leaves Jamie no choice but to call Joey for help. Confused on where he stands, Mark starts to court Jenna and asks her on a real date. Cynthia’s true colors come out as the rest of the crew gets to know her better.

episodes.name: Resting Chef Face
episodes.overview: After breaking the rules and using the lodge for extra-curricular activities, Mark and Jenna must face the music from newly appointed Lodge Manager Jamie, at the urging of Louise. Later, Los Angeles fashionistas, the Nubry Bloggers, arrive with many last minute demands that put the staff to the test. Not helping matters is a stubborn Nikita, who refuses to be a team player, putting a strain on everyone, especially Louise. Jamie tries to sort everything out, but tensions between Nikita and Louise finally boil over after a discrepancy with tips.

episodes.name: Pickly Like a Cactus
episodes.overview: Tensions with Nikita force Jamie to reach out to Joey Gibbons for a resolution. Overworked Louise loses her cool when the staff has to host two separate groups of guests. Everyone scrambles to keep outrageous rockers isolated from a wholesome Midwestern family. Meanwhile, Cynthia and Colston devise a plan to find Tinder dates for each other, with mixed results. And Jenna begins to question the accelerated pace of her relationship with Mark.

episodes.name: Not My First Hall Pass
episodes.overview: Mark reveals incidents from his past that shock homesick Jenna. Wealthy Texans want a “Lone Star” experience at Timber Creek Lodge and insert themselves into the staff’s personal lives— pushing Mark to his limit and to cross professional lines, putting the future of the Lodge in jeopardy. Colston has a special, unexpected connection with one of the guests, and Cynthia launches an investigation, as a result of her Tinder date.

episodes.name: A Hard 7 at Best
episodes.overview: Timber Creek Lodge is, once again, double booked – this time with international models and Hawaiian hotties. Jamie struggles to make it through the last guests, as things quickly begin to unravel.  Mark and Jenna face their biggest challenge after a guest shows Mark special attention and more. Emotions run high and professional lines are blurred as Blake’s snowboarding Instagram posts get him into hot water and Colston finds he may have bitten off more than he can chew.

episodes.name: He Gave Her the Tip
episodes.overview: Marks’s choices impact Timber Creek Lodge and bring him deep regret.  Joey calls an end of the season meeting with the team, causing worry from several of the staff. Cynthia receives a heartbreaking text and does something completely out of character, which surprises Louise.  Jenna settles the score with Mark.
